message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1,100,000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable solution.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I understand your budgetary constraints, however the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000.  I believe this price reflects the product's worth while still offering you a great deal.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Considering my budget, I am comfortable with a price of $1,250,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
